step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in this starting position.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch steady is great. Ensure your head stays upright and you're not pulling forward.
Returning to the start smoothly is good. Keep up the controlled movements.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and maintain an upright head. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
